item.title: CVE-2021-34643|2024-08-04T00:19:47.341Z -- skaut%20bazar -- skaut%20bazar
item.description: The Skaut bazar WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting due to the use of $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] in the ~/skaut-bazar.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.3.2.
